creator: Szabolcs Árvai
descriptionHtml:
Score Counter is for people who ever played a game where they needed to write down points for each player and perhaps count them.
This application offers a simple solution to make games more enjoyable and easier to follow without pen and paper and even a calculator.
The only thing you have to do is to add players and start a new game. In a running game you can add rounds and set points during the game.
You can also edit rounds, change colors of users/teams, check game status, add new player for a running game, finish and restart game. The username and score sum rows will always stay visible while scrolling.
The app is available in Dark and Light mode as well, and in several languages: English, Hungarian, Romanian, Spanish, French, Italian.

Would you like to use the app in your mother language? You can help me translating it: https://localazy.com/p/score.counter
If you find a bug, please send me an email with the bug description. I'll try to fix it as soon as possible.

Uno, Solo, Card Games, Board Games, Points, Point Counter, Counting
descriptionShort: Simple and easy to use point counter application for games.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - You can edit now a single score directly from game screen.

title: Score Counter - For any game

creator: Szabolcs Árvai
descriptionHtml:
Score Counter app is for those passionate players who like to keep track of points when playing a game. This application offers a simple solution to make games more enjoyable and count scores easily without needing a pen, paper, or calculator.

Main features:
• Up to 12 players (can add more for running games)
• Add, edit and remove rounds
• History: all games are saved locally on your device
• Modify score from the game screen (simple tap) or from edit round screen (long tap)
• Change username or color
• Finish, restart, or continue a finished game
• Check game status in 3 different charts
• Username and score sum rows will always stay visible while scrolling
• Dark and Light mode
• In-app calculator
• Languages: English, Hungarian, Romanian, Spanish, French, Italian, and more are coming
• No Ads!

Would you like to use the app in your mother language? You can help me translating it: https://localazy.com/p/score.counter
If you find a bug, please send me an email with the bug description. I'll try to fix it as soon as possible.

title: Score Counter - For any game

creator: Szabolcs Árvai
descriptionHtml:
The Score Counter app is for those passionate players who like to keep track of points when playing a game. This application offers a simple solution to make games more enjoyable and count scores easily without needing a pen, paper, or calculator.

Main features:
• Up to 30+ players (can add more for running games)
• Select the order of the players
• Add, edit and remove rounds
• History: all games are saved locally on your device
• Modify score from the game screen (simple tap) or from edit round screen (long tap)
• Change username or color
• Finish, restart, or continue a finished game
• Check game status in 4 different charts
• Username and score sum rows will always stay visible while scrolling
• Dark and Light mode
• In-app calculator
• Custom short inputs;
• Export game into xlsx (excel) file;
• Supported languages: English, Hungarian, Romanian, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Armenian, Santali, Polish, Esperanto, Catalan, Turkish, Brazilian Portuguese.
• No Ads!

Would you like to use the app in your mother language? You can help me translate it: https://localazy.com/p/score.counter
If you find a bug, please send me an email with the bug description. I'll try to fix it as soon as possible.
